title: Kimetsu no Yaiba x MLB

alternative_titles.ja: 「鬼滅の刃」×「MLB Tokyo Series presented by Guggenheim」

synopsis:
To commemorate the "MLB Tokyo Series presented by Guggenheim," a collaboration movie between the anime Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba and MLB, has been released! This special video depicts one of the major themes of Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba, "the inheritance of feelings," from the perspective of Japanese baseball history. 

(Source: Official Website)
